application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The details hereby approved relate to Conditions 3 (Materials - Part b) and 9 (Details of Plant) for the Multi-Use Hall (Project D) phase only of planning permission ref.2393/APP/2023/1598 dated 29-09-23. The applicant is reminded that the remaining parts of Conditions 3 and 9 are required to be discharged.
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Conditions 3 (Materials - Part b) and 9 (Details of Plant) for the Multi-Use Hall (Project D) phase only of planning permission ref.2393/APP/2023/1598, dated 29-09-23 (Minor Material amendment to revise/remove Conditions 2 (Approved Plans), 4 (Multi-Use Hall Levels), 7 (Landscaping) and 10 (Ecological Enhancements) of planning permission ref. 2393/APP/2015/1146, dated 07-08-2015: Creation of science laboratories above the existing West Wing, extension to existing hall/West Wing to create a multi-purpose hall, refurbishment of internal rooms, enclosure and refurbishment of the internal courtyard and alterations to manoeuvring yard and access road with associated landscape works (Application for Full Planning Permission) to allow revisions to the energy strategy, including the location and provision of energy infrastructure, revision of the landscape strategy, including the re-configuration of car and coach parking arrangements, external facade changes to the multi-use hall and regularisation of the as-built science block roof extension).
